cover.title: Business Aligned
cover.subtitle: Understanding Our Clients Business to Meet Their Legal Needs

cover.title: Address
cover.address: Calle Las Trojes 120-B, Lomas 4ta sección C.P. 78216, San Luis Potosí, S.L.P.

paragraphs.text: Jaime Eduardo Martínez has more than 15 years of experience counseling local and multinational companies on corporate and contractual law, among other fields related with business legal advice. His field of expertise includes counseling and advice in protection of IP rights, as well as in immigration procedures.

Jaime Eduardo has acted as counsel to a considerable number of foreign companies all-along their investment process in Mexico, from incorporation and structuring of subsidiaries and including negotiation and improvement of joint venture agreements and other business-integration contracts, including mergers and acquisitions, as well as execution and coordination of due diligence processes.

Furthermore, he has participated in the negotiation of commercial contracts for a broad range of transactions among national and multinational clients, including the brokering of credits, provision of securities, shareholders’ agreements, and others.

list.item: Various postgraduate courses and seminars on Public and Private International Law, Corporate Law, Intellectual Property and Alternative Dispute Resolution Systems with emphasis on Negotiation, Mediation and Arbitration.
Professor of Civil Contracts, Intellectual Property and Public International Law, Instituto Tecnológico de Estudios Superiores of Monterrey – Campus San Luis Potosí, San Luis Potosi, Mexico.
Course on Recent Developments in American Law at Fordham Law School, New York, USA.
BA in Law , Universidad Marista – Universidad Champagnat, San Luis Potosi,  Mexico.
Founding Member of the Barra Mexicana Colegio de Abogados.
Graduated as BA in Law with honors from Universidad Marista – Universidad Champagnat, San Luis Potosi, Mexico.

cover.title: Corporate
cover.descriptionOne: Has vast experience in incorporation of Mexican business corporations, transformations, Mergers and Acquisitions, spin-offs, dissolution and winding-up processes, so as strategic decision making and corporate actions (shareholders’ resolutions, shareholders’ agreements and board meetings). The firm also specializes in compliance with foreign
cover.descriptionTwo: investment laws, privacy, anti-corruption, anti-trust laws, among others. Our lawyers also have considerable experience in coordination and performance of due diligence processes, including issuance of legal opinions for preventive, corrective or transactional purposes, either for stock acquisitions or other assets; our field of expertise includes planning and preparing corporate and associative strategies, restructure (asset management, corporate governance, succession, strategic alliances, etc.), domestic and international transactions, drafting and negotiation of all sorts of contracts, agreements,

fold2.subtitle: Includes planning and preparing corporate and associative strategies,
fold2.description: Restructure (asset management, corporate governance, succession, strategic alliances, etc.), domestic and international transactions, drafting and negotiation of all sorts of contracts, agreements, understandings, letters of intent, so as following-up of administrative compliance, including filing for, renewing and updating of licenses, permits and authorizations, either local, state or federal.

cover.title: Mergers & Acquisitions
cover.descriptionOne: Lawyers have broad experience and in-depth knowledge in handling mergers and acquisitions.

fold2.subtitle: Include advising to national and international clients,
fold2.description: In the instrumentation of joint ventures, corporate and associative strategies or restructures and other schemes of commercial development.

cover.title: Labor & Employment
cover.descriptionOne: Our Labor Law Practice Group focuses mainly on providing preventive assistance, covering all aspects of a labor relationship (individual and union’s), including all sort of counselling in drafting and execution of individual employment or union contracts.
cover.descriptionTwo: Besides our preventive approach, all members to the Labor Law Practice Group have plenty of experience in handling cases and representing our clients on litigation proceedings, so as administrative inspections by state or federal authorities.

fold2.subtitle: Includes preparation and execution of strategies,
fold2.description: Associated with transferring personnel due to corporate restructuring, as well as hiring foreign staff and sending Mexican staff for training abroad.

cover.title: Intellectual Property
cover.descriptionOne: Has a practice group specialized in intellectual property, including feasibility analysis for inventions and trademarks, copyright and drafting and negotiation of licences, franchises, transfer of technologies, confidentiality, software development.

fold2.subtitle: Includes advising on strategies for confidential information
fold2.description: As well as for trade secrets, advertising and other transactions involving transfer or protection of intellectual property.

cover.title: Immigration
cover.descriptionOne: Has vast experience in handling all sorts of immigration proceedings required by companies hiring foreign staff and/or due to new job offers, corporate restructure and so on.

fold2.subtitle: Includes assistance in obtaining and/or renewing visas
fold2.description: Granted by other countries through their respective Consulates or Embassies.

cover.title: Real Estate
cover.descriptionOne: Members have been involved in real estate development projects of industrial, commercial and housing type, supporting its clients in all legal aspects during the planning, construction, sale and up to the finalization of the project.

fold2.subtitle: Includes our assistance in transactions
fold2.description: Related to the sale and acquisition of real estate properties, so as the coordination and performance of enhanced due diligence processes in connection to such properties.

cover.title: Foreign Investment
cover.descriptionOne: Lawyers have vast experience with foreign investment projects in Mexico, counseling foreign clients with investment schemes in Mexico, as well as Mexican clients with investment projects with foreign investors.

fold2.subtitle: Includes the counseling on the compliance
fold2.description: Of applicable foreign investment laws, and the representation before the National Foreign Investment Commission, the General Bureau of Foreign Investment, and the National Foreign Investment Registry, among others.

cover.title: Constitutional Amparo & Administrative Proceedings
cover.descriptionOne: Specialize in filing for and keeping up to date all governmental licences, permits and authorizations before the government authorities, as well as in the performance of due diligence procedures and the improvement of actions tending to comply with the administrative laws, regulations and ordinances, either federal, state and/or municipal.
cover.descriptionTwo: In addition to the preventive approach, the lawyers of this practice area handle the assistance and monitoring of audits or reviews initiated to our clients by administrative authorities, either federal, state or municipal, as well as in the challenging of authority resolutions, and the representation of our clients in litigations before Federal and Local Administrative Courts.

fold2.subtitle: Includes specialize in Amparo proceedings
fold2.description: which is a highly sophisticated constitutional appeal, through which we have achieved great success in the challenging of laws, administrative or judicial authority resolutions, among other acts that unlawfully restrict our clients’ interests.

cover.title: Civil & Commercial Litigation
cover.descriptionOne: Has a team of specialists in civil & commercial litigation, who have a broad knowledge and experience in the handling of conflicts aroused from the performance of contractual obligations, shareholders’ disputes, and wrongful acts in general,
cover.descriptionTwo: Through the representation in alternative dispute resolution methods, or in court trials to be held before local and federal courts in Mexico.

fold2.subtitle: Includes the main approach of avoiding
fold2.description: To the extent possible, the promotion of lengthy litigations with big costs that tend to be impractical from our client’s business standpoint.

footer.address: Calle Las Trojes 120-B, Lomas 4ta sección C.P. 78216, San Luis Potosí, S.L.P
